entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
